message: Let's be fair and split the money evenly.
Come on, I gave in a bit!
I'm willing to give you a little more, but I still need a good share.
I'm willing to go up to 600,000, but I'm starting to lose a lot of money here.  Let's make a deal.
You're losing a lot, I'm being generous!
I'm getting desperate here! I'm willing to go up to 650,000. This is my final offer.
You said that was your final offer, but I'll give you this anyway.
